instruction: Create a three-column table that displays the advantages and disadvantages of online shopping.
output:
| Advantages                                                        | Disadvantages                                               |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| Convenient and time saving                                       | Risk of credit card fraud                                   |
| Wider selection of products and services                         | Higher cost of shipping and handling                        |
| Comparison of different offers across different vendors          | Issues with returns and customer service                    |
| Lower prices due to low overhead costs                           | Uncertainty due to insufficient product description or photo |
